description.value:
You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5ZW1w9f4gWlSIuWA]{Teleportation Circle} ritual, allowing you to create a gateway between two distant points in space. Unlike the normal teleportation circle, a shadow gate makes use of the Shadow Plane to transport creatures from one end to the other and has the shadow trait.

If the result of the ritual is a Critical Failure, the circle becomes a failed shadow gate which transports any creature that enters to a random location in the Netherworld and inflicts them with 2d6 points of void damage per rank of the ritual. If the creature is reduced to 0 HP from this damage, they are instantly transformed into @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.XrmHgbKgcHDi4OnK]{Shadows} upon their arrival.
